meanings.definition: Add as an attachment or supplement.
meanings.sent1: She appends a photo to her email.
meanings.sent2: He always appends a bibliography to his essays.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel appends an extra acorn to its stash.
meanings.sent4: The artist appends a signature to the bottom of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The chef appends a sprinkle of herbs to the dish.

meanings.definition: To add at the end of a document or piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: He appends a conclusion to his report.
meanings.sent2: She appends a postscript to her letter.
meanings.sent3: The detective appends a surprising twist to the end of the story.
meanings.sent4: The comedian appends a hilarious punchline to his joke.
meanings.sent5: The student appends a thoughtful reflection to the essay.
